description: The kitchen is the engine of the home. An efficient, organized, and clean kitchen makes cooking more enjoyable and daily life easier.
sentences: Organize your kitchen based on the 'work triangle': the stove, sink, and refrigerator.
Ensure you have adequate counter space for food preparation.
Good ventilation (chimney or exhaust fan) is crucial for Indian cooking.
Invest in good quality basic cookware, knives, and appliances.
Keep your pantry and fridge organized to reduce food waste and make meal planning easier.
dos: Clean as you go while cooking to prevent a huge mess later.
Regularly sharpen your knives for safety and efficiency.
Deep clean your kitchen appliances and cabinets periodically.
donts: Don't put hot pans directly on the counter surface.
Avoid storing flammable items near the stove.
Don't neglect cleaning the chimney filter.
